https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5TNSfR1OdcNHMnJV7QczdqdfaGR.jpg In this true-life twist on a holiday fable, Jeremy Morris brings a whole new meaning to Christmas spirit when his extravagant seasonal display sparks a dispute with his neighbors that lands them all in court. 'Twas the Fight Before Christmas
